title: 💎 Infinitum Campaign - LIVE FEST Dash 💎
description:
🔥 200,000 Diamonds Are Up for Grabs! Here’s your chance to stand out and make your mark! If we finish in the Top 1-8 as a network, you could win big!

🏆 Top Prizes:
1st Place: 🏅 50,000 Diamonds + 1-Hour LIVE Promote + Exclusive TikTok Swag 💎✨

2nd Place: 🥈 40,000 Diamonds + 1-Hour LIVE Promote + Exclusive TikTok Swag 💎🎁

3rd Place: 🥉 30,000 Diamonds + 1-Hour LIVE Promote + Exclusive TikTok Swag 🔑💎

🎉 Consolation Prizes (4th - 10th Place):
Each creator will receive 10,000 Diamonds 💎💖

🚀 How to WIN?
Earn LIVE Fest Points by going LIVE! Engage your audience, boost interactions, and rack up points. The more you stream and hype up your audience, the higher your rank!

⏳ Sign-Up Deadline:
November 19, 2024 — Enroll in LIVE Fest now to automatically enter the competition.

🌧️ Let’s flood the network with Diamonds! 💠
💖 Best of luck, creators! Let’s make this LIVE Fest legendary! 💪

⚠️ Note: Creators can only claim one Infinitum Campaign reward for LIVE Fest. If a creator qualifies for multiple prizes, the next highest-ranked creator will receive the additional rewards.

title: [November 2024] Guessing Game Challenge
description:
Want to have fun with your gaming community and collect Diamonds during LIVE?
Join the Guessing Game Challenge from Nov 13th - 24th!

How do you participate?
Post videos, set up guessing games to share reward pools and rank high on the special ranking to win up to 50,000 Diamonds.

Your viewers?
They get a chance to collect exclusive gaming stickers by participating in your guessing games.

title: [November 2024] Giving Thanks On LIVE
description:
Topline:
It's the season of 🧡giving thanks and gratitude🧡
... And what better way to do that than on LIVE!
We want to take a moment to celebrate the incredible bond between creators and their viewers. TikTok LIVE has become more than just a platform - it's a community where stories are shared, talents are showcased, and deep connections are made. Our creators inspire us daily and it's all thanks to the viewers who support them!

Join Giving Thanks on LIVE Campaign and rank on the leaderboard by receiving/sending exclusive campaign gifts and finishing multi-level missions!

Dates: Monday November 4th - Sunday November 17th

Gameplay:
There will be 3 different Creator leaderboards, Pumpkins, Scarecrows, and Turkeys. What leaderboard the Creator is placed on is determined by their LIVE performance in the past 30 days.
You will see one of these images on the campaign page that discloses what leaderboard you are on and the 'how to win' information!

Rewards:
The leaderboards and missions will reset weekly, which means double the chance to win rewards!

title: Post your honest experience of Infinitum ✨💬 [Get rewarded 💎🎁]
description:
Post an honest video review of your journey with Infinitum LIVE Creator Network—whether good or bad—and get rewarded! 🙌 The creator with the most views, shares, reposts, and referred creators from their video on November 5th will win 10,000 diamonds! 💎✨ Second place gets 7,500 diamonds, and third place will receive 5,000 diamonds.

To enter, make sure to tag our official account @infinitumcreatornetwork and use the hashtags: #InfinitumLIVECreatorNetwork #TikTokLIVECreatorNetwork #JoinInfinitumCreatorNetwork

We need at least 50 Participants for the rewards to be distributed
MAKE SURE TO USE ALL THE HASHTAGS

Link this page for them to apply https://infinitumlive.com/creator-pre-check/ with your username as the referral code.

That's it!

Your referral code is your username! 🆔🎉 It’s that simple—create your video now and start earning BIG! 💥🚀

title: Infinitum Presents: 2024 Monster Mayhem Melee
description:
https://forms.gle/aC5xKMDVf8ZQmuSB9

Get ready to celebrate this Halloween season with the return of MONSTER MAYHEM MELEE!!!! These are Halloween costume 4 way live matches and you will run 2 match rounds per scheduled melee battle. Participants may not exceed more than 2 scheduled battles per event day. (If you are subbing in for an opponent that didn’t show up and you’re in costume, you can still earn Melee points) The objective is to accumulate as many melee points as possible by Oct 31st. Each group will run the matches as 1vs1vs1vs1 and melee points are awarded based on where you place after each round. Be sure to sign up before Oct 20th 2024 and remember to screenshot your matches each time you complete a match.

Points per match rounds (2 rounds = 1 melee Battle)
1st = 5 melee points
2nd = 4 melee points
3rd = 3 melee points
4th = 2 melee points

A scoreboard/leaderboard with everyone’s melee points will be posted at the end of each night or beginning of the next day. All of your accumulative melee points will be added together at the end of the event and there will be a 1st, 2nd and 3rd place winner.

1st place - Large TikTokLIVE hoodie, Creator Hat and TikTok keychain
2nd place - Creator Hat, TikTokLIVE badge pin
3rd place - TikTokLIVE Fanny pack, TikTokLIVE keychain
